com.mesosphere.mesos.rx.java.util

Interface MessageCodec<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the message type that this codec is defined for
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProtoCodec, StringMessageCodec

    public interface MessageCodec<T>
    A MessageCodec<T> defines how values of type T can be serialized to and deserialized from sequences of bytes.

    There should be at least one implementation of this interface for every type of message that can be sent to or received.

      • mediaType

        @NotNull
@NotNull String mediaType()
        Returns the IANA media type of the serialized message format handled by this object.

        The value returned by this method will be used in the Content-Type and Accept headers for messages sent to and received from Mesos, respectively.

        Returns:
        the media type identifier

      • show

        @NotNull
@NotNull String show(@NotNull
                              T message)
        Renders the given message to informative, human-readable text.

        The intent of this method is to allow messages to be easily read in program logs and while debugging.

        Parameters:
        message - the message to render
        Returns:
        the rendered message
